snippet: The State Supreme Court has suspended a judge’s ruling striking down Arkansas’ ban on same-sex marriage, halting the issuance of licenses that have been obtained by hundreds of couples.
abstract: Arkansas State Supreme Court suspends Judge Chris Piazza's ruling striking down state's ban on same-sex marriage, halting the issuance of licenses that have been obtained by hundreds of gay couples.
